--- Testing vfmaddsub231pd (Fused Multiply-Alternating Add/Subtract of Packed Double-Precision Floating-Point Values) ---
Input a: 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 4.500000 
Input b: 0.500000 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 
Input c: 1.000000 2.000000 3.000000 4.000000 
Result: -0.250000 5.750000 5.750000 19.750000 
Expected: -0.250000 5.750000 5.750000 19.750000 

[Special values test]
Test case 1:
a: 0x7ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x7ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
b: 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
c: 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
result: 0xfff0000000000000 0x4000000000000000 0xfff0000000000000 0x4000000000000000 
Test case 2:
a: 0xfff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0xfff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
b: 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
c: 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
result: 0x7ff0000000000000 0x4000000000000000 0x7ff0000000000000 0x4000000000000000 
Test case 3:
a: 0x7ff8000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x7ff8000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
b: 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
c: 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
result: 0x7ff8000000000000 0x4000000000000000 0x7ff8000000000000 0x4000000000000000 
Test case 4:
a: 0x0000000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x0000000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
b: 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
c: 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 
result: 0x3ff0000000000000 0x4000000000000000 0x3ff0000000000000 0x4000000000000000 
Test case 5:
a: 0x7fe1ccf385ebc8a0 0x4000000000000000 0x7fe1ccf385ebc8a0 0x4000000000000000 
b: 0x0000000000000000 0x0000000000000000 0x0000000000000000 0x0000000000000000 
c: 0x0000000000000000 0x0000000000000000 0x0000000000000000 0x0000000000000000 
result: 0xffe1ccf385ebc8a0 0x4000000000000000 0xffe1ccf385ebc8a0 0x4000000000000000 

[Rounding modes test]
Rounding mode 0:
MXCSR: 0x00001F80
  [ ] DAZ - Denormals Are Zero: 0
  [ ] FTZ - Flush To Zero: 0
Flags: I:0 D:0 Z:0 O:0 U:0 P:0
Result: -1.400000 1.600000 -1.400000 1.600000

  [ ] FTZ - Flush To Zero: 0

  [ ] FTZ - Flush To Zero: 0
